name: Tuber Trouble
description:
Winter is coming, and so are they!

Tuber Trouble is a game where you play as a farmer trying to harvest her carrots before they harvest her. Survive until winter with as many carrots as possible lest the horde of self-germinating tubers eat you alive.

Credits

Vyolfers - Graphics

PanKeiki - Graphics

Skullpaca - Code & Music
